text: avann kastata badhiccatinu sesam nam'mute pakkal ninnulla karunyam nam avann anubhavippiccal tirccayayum avan parayum: it enikk avakasappettatakunnu. antyasamayam nilavil varumenn nan vicarikkunnilla. ini enre raksitavinkalekk nan tiriccayakkappetukayanenkilea enikk avanre atukkal tirccayayum erravum meccappetta nila tanneyanuntayirikkuka. ennal satyanisedhikalkk avar pravartticcatinepparri nam vivaram nalkukayum kathinamaya siksayil ninn nam avarkk anubhavippikkukayum ceyyum
